DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety durability effect ALKS 9072 ( also know ALKS 9070 ) long-term treatment subject stable schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Safety Study ALKS 9072 ( Also Known ALKS 9070 )
DOC.criteria: ( Subjects participate ALK9072003 ) Completed ALK9072003 Day 85 visit Continues require treatment antipsychotic medication ( New Subjects ) On stable dose oral antipsychotic medication Diagnosis chronic schizophrenia base Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition ( DSMIV ) criteria clinically stable Has able achieve outpatient status 3 month prior screen Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 40.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Resides stable living situation ( Subjects participate ALK9072003 ) Abnormal clinical laboratory , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) find participation study ALK9072003 clinically relevant relate study drug Missed 1 schedule study visit participation study ALK9072003 Has significant unstable medical condition would preclude safe completion current study Subject pregnant breastfeeding Subject expect incarcerate next 12 month , pending legal action may impact compliance study participation procedure ( New Subjects ) History poor inadequate clinical response treatment aripiprazole History treatment resistance Diagnosis current substance dependence ( include alcohol ) Pregnant , lactating , breastfeeding Has receive longacting intramuscular antipsychotic medication within 60 day prior screen Currently involuntary hospitalization Current expect incarceration Additional inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
